title: Maa Voori Magadu
text:
Maa Voori Magadu is a 1987 Indian Telugu <a href="action%20drama%20film">action drama film</a> starring <a href="Krishna%20Ghattamaneni">Krishna Ghattamaneni</a>, <a href="Sridevi">Sridevi</a> and <a href="Kaikala%20Satyanarayana">Kaikala Satyanarayana</a> in the lead roles alongside an ensemble supporting cast which includes <a href="Gollapudi%20Maruti%20Rao">Gollapudi Maruti Rao</a>, <a href="Nutan%20Prasad">Nutan Prasad</a>, <a href="Suttivelu">Suttivelu</a> and <a href="Kota%20Srinivasa%20Rao">Kota Srinivasa Rao</a>. Scripted by <a href="Paruchuri%20Brothers">Paruchuri Brothers</a>, directed by <a href="K.%20Bapayya">K. Bapayya</a> and produced by T. Srinivasa Reddy for Sri Vinay Art Pictures, the film had musical score by Chakravarthy. Released on 30 October 1987, the film is an average fare at the box office.
Music.
The film's soundtrack album comprising 5 tracks was scored and composed by Chakravarthy and lyrics penned by Veturi Sundararama Murthy.
